title: Immoral Obsession
description: Elizabeth seeks revenge…The man who ruined her life has her being hunted like an animal in an online game. She has lost everything she cared about because of him. Now he’s offered one million dollars for her capture.Tony might be her only hope. His feelings for her have never dwindled since she dumped him long ago. Strong, capable, reliable, he’s going to protect her even if it means giving up his own life.As Elizabeth and Tony reconnect, the game’s players hijack their destiny…Can she maneuver through the trauma of facing her past transgressor? Or will she risk it all to get her retribution on the monster that otherwise will never leave her alone?A suspenseful psychological page-turner with a sexy romance on the side.Will our strong heroine survive as she fights for her freedom and all the things she holds dear?
author: Theresa Papa
